paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: With over 30 years of experience, our attorneys have obtained numerous multi-million dollar verdicts and settlements.

detailsData.title: Personalized Representation
detailsData.content: We take the time to understand each client's unique situation and provide individualized attention throughout the case.

detailsData.title: Trial Experience
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are trial lawyers who are not afraid to take cases to court if necessary, ensuring the best possible outcomes for our clients.

address: 1880 Century Park East, Suite 1415, Los Angeles, CA 90067
valueProp: Pocrass & De Los Reyes is a leading Los Angeles law firm that provides big firm expertise and small firm service to people who have suffered serious personal injuries or to the families who have lost a loved one to a wrongful death due to the carelessness or negligence of another.

testimonalData.text: Pocrass & De Los Reyes helped me get the compensation I deserved after my accident. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: The attorneys at Pocrass & De Los Reyes are truly dedicated to their clients' well-being. I couldn't have asked for better representation.
testimonalData.author: Jane Doe

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the professionalism and care shown by Pocrass & De Los Reyes during a difficult legal matter. Thank you!
testimonalData.author: Robert Johnson
